title: Desktop/laptop ownership among U.S. adults 2008 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of U.S. adults in each Month on the y axis.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
The difference of Share of U.S. adults between the highest and lowest Month is 5.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Share of U.S. adults in each Month on the y axis.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
The difference of Share of U.S. adults between the highest and lowest Month is 5.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of U.S. adults for 9 number of Months.
The Share of U.S. adults is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2016 and lowest at Month January 2018.
Second maximum Share of U.S. adults is found at Month June 2010.
The highest Month November 2016 has 5.0 more Share of U.S. adults than the lowest Month January 2018.
Month November 2016 is higher than any other Months with value 78.0, followed by June 2010, and June 2010. Down to Month January 2018 with the lowest value 73.0.
Over the past 9 Months, the Share of U.S. adults has remained constant.
Similar Share of U.S. adults is found in Month February 2019, April 2016, and January 2008.
The Month January 2018 has 1.04 times less Share of U.S. adults than average.
The Share of U.S. adults is 677.0 if we add up values of all Months.
